issue.message: Issue `InvalidPackage` was configured with severity `warning` in dtc, but was not enabled (or was disabled) in library common
issue.explanation:
Any issues that are specifically disabled in a library cannot be re-enabled in a dependent project. To fix this you need to also enable the issue in the library project.
(This also applies for issues that are off by default; they cannot just be enabled in a dependent project; they must also be enabled in all the libraries the project depends on.)

issue.message: Issue `InvalidPackage` was configured with severity `warning` in dtc, but was not enabled (or was disabled) in library domain
issue.explanation:
Any issues that are specifically disabled in a library cannot be re-enabled in a dependent project. To fix this you need to also enable the issue in the library project.
(This also applies for issues that are off by default; they cannot just be enabled in a dependent project; they must also be enabled in all the libraries the project depends on.)

issue.message: Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter
issue.summary: Guidelines for Modifier parameters in a Composable function
issue.explanation: The first (or only) Modifier parameter in a Composable function should follow the following rules: - Be named `modifier` - Have a type of `Modifier` - Either have no default value, or have a default value of `Modifier` - If optional, be the first optional parameter in the parameter list
